About Me

Hi my name is Will, I am a self taught web developer based in Manchester. After a successful career working as a sound engineer and broadcast technician I decided to develop my long standing programming skills into a career in web development. As someone who thrives on learning the process of developing my skills in programming has been thoroughly rewarding. I am looking for employers who can help me develop further, and to whom I can demonstrate my aptitude, commitment, positive attitude and creativity.

Outside of work I am also a musician. I have played everything from choral music to samba and have performed in ensembles on both British and Brazilian national television. Over the last few years I have taught myself electronic engineering, Portutguese, flamenco guitar and sourdough baking alongside web development.
